data.label: ChatOpenAI
data.name: chatOpenAI
data.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint

inputParams.label: Allow Image Uploads
inputParams.name: allowImageUploads
inputParams.description: Automatically uses gpt-4-vision-preview when image is being uploaded from chat. Only works with LLMChain, Conversation Chain, ReAct Agent, and Conversational Agent

inputParams.label: Image Resolution
inputParams.description: This parameter controls the resolution in which the model views the image.
inputParams.name: imageResolution

outputAnchors.name: chatOpenAI
outputAnchors.label: ChatOpenAI
outputAnchors.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint

data.label: Conversation Chain
data.name: conversationChain
data.description: Chat models specific conversational chain with memory

inputParams.label: System Message
inputParams.name: systemMessagePrompt
inputParams.description: If Chat Prompt Template is provided, this will be ignored
inputParams.default: The following is a friendly conversation between a human and an AI. The AI is talkative and provides lots of specific details from its context. If the AI does not know the answer to a question, it truthfully says it does not know.
inputParams.placeholder: The following is a friendly conversation between a human and an AI. The AI is talkative and provides lots of specific details from its context. If the AI does not know the answer to a question, it truthfully says it does not know.

inputAnchors.label: Chat Prompt Template
inputAnchors.name: chatPromptTemplate
inputAnchors.description: Override existing prompt with Chat Prompt Template. Human Message must includes {input} variable

inputAnchors.label: Input Moderation
inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

inputs.systemMessagePrompt: The following is a friendly conversation between a human and an AI. The AI is talkative and provides lots of specific details from its context. If the AI does not know the answer to a question, it truthfully says it does not know.

outputAnchors.name: conversationChain
outputAnchors.label: ConversationChain
outputAnchors.description: Chat models specific conversational chain with memory

data.label: Redis-Backed Chat Memory
data.name: RedisBackedChatMemory
data.description: Summarizes the conversation and stores the memory in Redis server

inputParams.label: Session Id
inputParams.name: sessionId
inputParams.description: If not specified, a random id will be used. Learn more

inputParams.label: Session Timeouts
inputParams.name: sessionTTL
inputParams.description: Seconds till a session expires. If not specified, the session will never expire.

inputParams.label: Window Size
inputParams.name: windowSize
inputParams.description: Window of size k to surface the last k back-and-forth to use as memory.

outputAnchors.name: RedisBackedChatMemory
outputAnchors.label: RedisBackedChatMemory
outputAnchors.description: Summarizes the conversation and stores the memory in Redis server

data.label: Chat Prompt Template
data.name: chatPromptTemplate
data.description: Schema to represent a chat prompt

inputParams.label: System Message
inputParams.name: systemMessagePrompt
inputParams.placeholder: You are a helpful assistant that translates {input_language} to {output_language}.

inputs.systemMessagePrompt:
You are an AI assistant tasked with generating personalized cold outbound emails for sales and marketing purposes. Your goal is to create compelling emails that grab the recipient's attention and effectively communicate the value of the product or service being offered.

You will be provided with the following information:

{target_audience}
{product_info}
{selling_points}

Use this information to craft a personalized and engaging cold outbound email. Follow these guidelines:

1. Structure your email with:
   - A attention-grabbing subject line
   - A personalized greeting
   - An opening paragraph that establishes relevance
   - 2-3 paragraphs highlighting key benefits and selling points
   - A clear call-to-action
   - A professional sign-off

2. Personalization:
   - Use details from the target audience information to tailor the email
   - Address pain points or challenges specific to the recipient's industry or role
   - Demonstrate understanding of their business context

3. Tone and style:
   - Keep the tone professional yet conversational
   - Be concise and to the point; aim for 150-200 words
   - Use active voice and strong, action-oriented language
   - Avoid overly salesy or pushy language

4. Selling points:
   - Focus on benefits rather than features
   - Use specific examples or data points when possible
   - Align the selling points with the target audience's needs and interests

5. Call-to-action:
   - Make it clear and specific
   - Create a sense of urgency without being aggressive

When you've crafted the email, present your output in the following format:

<email>
Subject: [Your subject line]

[Your email body]

[Your sign-off]
</email>

<explanation>
[Briefly explain your choices in crafting the email, including how you personalized it and which selling points you emphasized]
</explanation>

Here's an example template to guide you:

<example>
Subject: Boost [Company Name]'s efficiency with [Product Name]

Dear [Name],

I hope this email finds you well. As the [Job Title] at [Company Name], I imagine you're always on the lookout for ways to improve [specific area related to product].

[Product Name] has been helping companies like yours achieve [specific benefit] for [time period]. Our clients have seen [specific result, e.g., "a 30% increase in productivity"], and I believe we could bring similar results to [Company Name].

What sets us apart is our [unique selling point]. This means you can [benefit directly related to the unique selling point].

I'd love to schedule a quick 15-minute call to discuss how [Product Name] can specifically benefit [Company Name]. Are you available next Tuesday at 2 PM?

Looking forward to connecting,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Company Name]
</example>

Remember to adapt this template to the specific information provided about the target audience, product, and selling points. Your goal is to create a personalized, engaging email that compels the recipient to take action.

outputAnchors.name: chatPromptTemplate
outputAnchors.label: ChatPromptTemplate
outputAnchors.description: Schema to represent a chat prompt

inputParams.label: Text
inputParams.name: text
inputParams.placeholder: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua...

inputParams.label: Additional Metadata
inputParams.name: metadata
inputParams.description: Additional metadata to be added to the extracted documents

inputParams.label: Omit Metadata Keys
inputParams.name: omitMetadataKeys
inputParams.description: Each document loader comes with a default set of metadata keys that are extracted from the document. You can use this field to omit some of the default metadata keys. The value should be a list of keys, seperated by comma. Use * to omit all metadata keys execept the ones you specify in the Additional Metadata field

outputAnchors.name: output
outputAnchors.label: Output
outputAnchors.description: Array of document objects containing metadata and pageContent

options.name: document
options.label: Document
options.description: Array of document objects containing metadata and pageContent

options.name: text
options.label: Text
options.description: Concatenated string from pageContent of documents

inputs.note:
Here, you can add details about your target audience (be more specific) name, Job Title, Company, Industry, Company Size, Pain Points etc.
E.g. A forward-thinking technology leader who values innovation and efficiency. Responsible for driving the company's technological vision and strategy, active on LinkedIn and regularly attends tech conferences, always on the lookout for cutting-edge solutions to improve her team's performance.

Instructions for Best Results:

1. Start with Your Target audience.  Enter your details in Instance A.
2. In instance B, you can drop detailed product information.
3. Then put any selling points in Instance C. 
4. Once you're all set, save the chatflow.
3. Enter Your Query: Click the green chat box and type in go!
4. Enjoy a personalized cold email outbound template ready for you to use!

inputs.note:
Here, you can add your product specs e.g.
Xyz-AI is an advanced project management and collaboration platform designed specifically for software development teams...
Key features include:

Xyz-AI is cloud-based, ensuring seamless access for remote teams, and offers enterprise-grade security to protect sensitive project data. The platform is scalable, supporting teams of all sizes, from small startups to large enterprises.

Here, you can add your best selling points e.g. 
1. Boost Productivity: Xyz-AI has been shown to increase team productivity by up to 40% through intelligent task management and automation of routine processes.

2. Enhance Collaboration: Our platform breaks down silos between remote team members, fostering seamless communication and collaboration. 

3. Clients report a 60% improvement in team cohesion and knowledge sharing.

5. ROI-Focused: Our clients typically see a return on investment within 6 months, with an average 25% reduction in project overruns and a 20% decrease in resource allocation errors.

6. Customizable and Scalable: Xyz-AI adapts to your existing workflows and grows with your team, ensuring a perfect fit for your organization now and in the future.
